Literature.Title: Diversity, Antimicrobial Action and Structure-Activity Relationship of Buffalo Cathelicidins.
Literature.Author: Brahma B, Patra MC, Karri S, Chopra M, Mishra P, De BC, Kumar S, Mahanty S, Thakur K, Poluri KM, Datta TK, De S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCDC 0111(MIC=25µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19111(MIC=6µM),Bacillus cereus NCDC 0240(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>200µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCDC 0105(MIC=>200µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=100µM),Escherichia coli MTCC 0723(MIC=200µM),Acinetobacter johnsonii NCDC 0072(MIC=200µM)
